remarks: A condition for a topology to be finer than another.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
isfne.1 $e |- X = U. A $.
isfne.2 $e |- Y = U. B $.
isfne4b $p |- ( B e. V -> ( A Fne B <-> ( X = Y /\ ( topGen ` A ) C_ ( topGen ` B ) ) ) ) $.
